column4: i think ubuntu sounds very appealin' and wanna give it a shot
i put lfs on my laptop four years ago and gentoo on my desktop two years ago : ) and am currently maintainin' a gentoo - freebsd network with a server and nine clients, in a law firm : )
like i typed, gentoo is the best choice to me, but it takes about two hours to set up. and i only have a weekend to set up seven clients i think. so i'm tempted to use ubuntu : )
